ComicInfo.Summary:
The tale of Conan through the eyes of RÃ¢ Morgana, a fallen priestess.
*Contents* "Child of Sorcery" adapted from a story by Cristy Marx by Roy Thomas and Ernie Chan. ~Ever wondered what happened to all the lovely ladies rescued by the swashbuckling Conan, after the sounds of battle had faded and the redoubtable Cimmerian left for parts unknown? Here's the wizard-filled saga of one such lass.~ Conan's Ladies a portfolio featuring the women of Conan's world by Bruce Patterson and friends. The Bullpen's Robert E. Howard a portfolio by John Byrne, Tim Conrad, Richard Corben and Rudy Nebres. Presenting: The Hyborian Players an article on Hyborian themed cosplay by Frank Thorne. The Wizard and Red Sonja Show by Frank Thorne.
ComicInfo.Title: Child of Sorcery; The Wizard and Red Sonja Show
